reviewText: The movie quality is terrible. I wanted to show this to my students, but the picture is so grainy. I'm not pleased.

I just saw this movie on Telemundo, And Love it. Even though I don't know spanish that much. But that didn't stop me from enjoying the film. The art work reminds me of '' the secret of Keels". Another great movie. A great PG movie.
This is a great adaptation of El Cid story, even if it is quite different sometimes! :-) Great for kids and teenagers!
Cuenta, ms o menos, la historia del Cid, pero sin las largas y aburridsimas descripciones de batallas y cenas. No dira que es fiel al texto original, pero para los nios es algo divertido.
